languages.text: "Я так и не спросил{mf||а} тебя... ты очень легко согласился последовать за мной. Почему?"
"I have been meaning to ask you... When offered the chance to follow me, you took it readily. Why is that?"
languages.original_text: "Я так и не спросил{mf||а} тебя... ты очень легко согласился последовать за мной. Почему?"

traits.locale_text: "I have been meaning to ask you... When offered the chance to follow me, you took it readily. Why is that?"
"I have been meaning to ask you... When offered the chance to follow me, you took it readily. Why is that?"
"I have been meaning to ask you... When offered the chance to follow me, you took it readily. Why is that?"
"I have been meaning to ask you... When offered the chance to follow me, you took it readily. Why is that?"

languages.text: «Quería preguntarte algo... Cuando te ofrecí la oportunidad de seguirme, aceptaste al momento. ¿Por qué?».
languages.original_text: "I have been meaning to ask you... When offered the chance to follow me, you took it readily. Why is that?"

traits.locale_text: «Quería preguntarte algo... Cuando te ofrecí la oportunidad de seguirme, aceptaste al momento. ¿Por qué?».

languages.text: “我一直想问你……我邀请你加入的时候，你问都没问就同意了，这是为什么？”
languages.original_text: "I have been meaning to ask you... When offered the chance to follow me, you took it readily. Why is that?"

traits.locale_text: “我一直想问你……我邀请你加入的时候，你问都没问就同意了，这是为什么？”

languages.text: 「お前に聞きたかったのだ…{mf|俺|私}について来ないかと言ったとき、お前はすぐにそれに応じたな。なぜだ？」
languages.original_text: "I have been meaning to ask you... When offered the chance to follow me, you took it readily. Why is that?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前に聞きたかったのだ…{mf|俺|私}について来ないかと言ったとき、お前はすぐにそれに応じたな。なぜだ？」

languages.text: « Je voulais vous demander... Quand je vous ai proposé de me suivre, vous avez sauté sur l'occasion. Pourquoi ? »
languages.original_text: "I have been meaning to ask you... When offered the chance to follow me, you took it readily. Why is that?"

traits.locale_text: « Je voulais vous demander... Quand je vous ai proposé de me suivre, vous avez sauté sur l'occasion. Pourquoi ? »

languages.text: "Ich will Euch schon seit einer Weile fragen ... Als Euch die Gelegenheit geboten wurde, mir zu folgen, habt Ihr sie sofort ergriffen. Warum das?"
languages.original_text: "I have been meaning to ask you... When offered the chance to follow me, you took it readily. Why is that?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich will Euch schon seit einer Weile fragen ... Als Euch die Gelegenheit geboten wurde, mir zu folgen, habt Ihr sie sofort ergriffen. Warum das?"

languages.text: "Soracağım, soramıyorum... Bana katılmayı önerdiğimde hiç düşünmeden kabul ettin. O niye?"
languages.original_text: "I have been meaning to ask you... When offered the chance to follow me, you took it readily. Why is that?"

traits.locale_text: "Soracağım, soramıyorum... Bana katılmayı önerdiğimde hiç düşünmeden kabul ettin. O niye?"
